name: kubernetes
description: Connect to Kubernetes cluster and manage pods, deployments, and services.

tools.name: describe_cronjob
tools.description: Get detailed information about a Kubernetes CronJob including recent job history

tools.name: describe_pod
tools.description: Describe a Kubernetes pod (read details like status, containers, etc.)

tools.name: describe_deployment
tools.description: Get details about a Kubernetes deployment

tools.name: explain_resource
tools.description: Get documentation for a Kubernetes resource or field

tools.name: get_events
tools.description: Get Kubernetes events from the cluster

tools.name: get_job_logs
tools.description: Get logs from Pods created by a specific Job

tools.name: get_logs
tools.description: Get logs from pods, deployments, jobs, or resources matching a label selector

tools.name: list_api_resources
tools.description: List the API resources available in the cluster

tools.name: list_jobs
tools.description: List Jobs in a namespace, optionally filtered by a CronJob parent

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in the cluster

tools.name: port_forward
tools.description: Forward a local port to a port on a Kubernetes resource
